list_definition.definition: the act of receiving or being received

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His speech got a good reception.

list_definition.definition: a formal party or social gathering to welcome guests
the quality of radio or television signals

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Radio reception is poor in this area.

list_definition.definition: the part of a hotel, hospital etc where visitors enter and are attended to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She went to the hotel reception to check in.
